Upcoming Community Events

20-APR-2021 | 17:30 (IL) - Kubernetes, Microservices, Production, Scale with Aerospike & Playtika



We are coming back with our first post-COVID hybrid event (in accordance with all 'Tav Yarok' regulations) with a meetup hosted by Aerospike at their awesome offices at the Brain Embassy TLV. The event will be capped to 50 in-person attendees, the rest are welcome to join virtually.
